bioAsHtml: Jean-Philippe Chatain is a French Software engineer working at Aldebaran as a Training Officer. Based at the Atelier in Paris, he dispenses training to the developers interested in building awesome apps for humanoid robots. Jean-Philippe has a Master's Degree in Computer Science from Staffordshire University in UK and a Master's Degree in General Engineering from ECAM in France.

acceptedTalks.title: Let's have fun with Pepper robot and Java

bio: Jean-Philippe Chatain is a French Software engineer working at Aldebaran as a Training Officer. Based at the Atelier in Paris, he dispenses training to the developers interested in building awesome apps for humanoid robots. Jean-Philippe has a Master's Degree in Computer Science from Staffordshire University in UK and a Master's Degree in General Engineering from ECAM in France.
